name: John's Awakening
description:
Welcome to my first real, true indie horror project. 

"John Wolfe, (semi) famous YouTuber, is stuck in his own dream sequence. How will he get out of this mess?"

Designed from the ground up as an homage to years of entertainment from JW. While he's not the most renown of his kind, he's the most unique, as he doesn't mince words, and gives proper constructive criticism.  Maybe with a bit of luck he'll play his own game..?

This game is in fact light hearted, with minimal cheap scares. If you aren't aware of who this person is, context will help enjoy this project. I suggest you look him up and watch a vid or 2 prior. It's also designed to be fun regardless. I welcome any and all feedback towards my first true game to follow; I promise it'll actually be scary. 

Proof John hates his fans!

John's expertise of HQ residential house

Running time: 20-30 minutes depending on ending
